title: Jonas Vingegaard Undergoes Surgery in Spain, with Recovery Time ‘Not Yet Clear’
content:
Remco Evenepoel returns home and Primož Roglič is 'feeling a bit better' as top stars show encouraging signs in recoveries from recent spate of crashes.

Read the full article at Jonas Vingegaard Undergoes Surgery in Spain, with Recovery Time ‘Not Yet Clear’ on Velo.
author: ahood
